3.text: The iPlant Collaborative is funded by a grant from the National Science Foundation Plant Cyberinfrastructure Program (#DBI-0735191).

4.title: What Users Love
4.text: "Everything was really straightforward and we were able to migrate our entire application in under a week." - Joe. User

2.title: What is Foundation?
2.text: Foundation is a RESTful API that brings HPC to the web. We built it from the ground up to give gateway developers and hackers alike access to today's highest performance resources at the lowest possible cost. Sign up for a free account today and chase down the discoveries of tomorrow.

29.subtitle: Always Eventful
29.text: You will never miss a single event when you integrate with Foundation. That's because Foundation's messaging system ensures that every event reaches its destination every time.

33.subtitle: Scalable
33.text: Worried about the growing usage at your site? So are we, that's why we designed Foundation to scale out to the cloud so we can handle your growth together.

35.subtitle: Backbone Not Backdoor
35.text: Foundation is a first-class citizen in today's HPC infrastructure. You can count on it to stay current even as the underlying systems change.

28.subtitle: Science On Demand
28.text: Through Foundation's apps service you have access to over 600 of today's top plant biology applications on the latest HPC and Cloud systems. Working the way you love to work, now at a larger scale with Foundation.

27.subtitle: Distributed Data Done Right
27.text: There are plenty of great things you could be doing with your time. Waiting for your data to transfer isn't one of them. Foundation takes the headache out of data management by providing you unlimited storage on the nation's top network.

34.subtitle: Plays Well With Others
34.text: Foundation is RESTful, responsive, and reliable. Just the thing you need when integrating the services of today to create the applications of tomorrow.
